A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Force Awakes was a decent movie\, and that is being generous but a horrible Star Wars movie; just a step up above Phantom Menace.  However\, this movie is just complete garbage.  Star wars is dead until they scratch all this cash grabs and go for some new quality magic.  Story was horrible\, as well as any of the characters attempt to be likable.  I'm all for true equality\, but when its force fed\, its not entertainment\, its a speech.  Just rip it.
